title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our dynamic frontend team to build responsive and modern web interfaces using React and TailwindCSS.

title: Backend Developer
description: We're looking for a backend engineer to design and maintain scalable APIs and server-side logic using Node.js and MongoDB.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design intuitive user experiences and beautiful interfaces for our products. Experience with Figma and user-centric design is a plus.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Looking for a full stack wizard to work across our frontend and backend systems. Docker knowledge is highly appreciated.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Help us scale and automate infrastructure with CI/CD pipelines, cloud deployments, and modern DevOps tools.

title: QA Engineer
description: Work with developers to test, report, and improve our applications. Experience in automation testing is a bonus.
